地理情報システム: (ちりじょうほうシステム) - geographic information system; GIS
地理的品種: (ちりてきひんしゅ) - geographic race
地理的隔離: (ちりてきかくり) - geographic isolation; geographical isolation
地産全消: (ちさんぜんしょう) - nationwide consumption of local products
地産地消: (ちさんちしょう) - local production for local consumption
地界: (ちかい) - boundary; bounds of the earth
地盤: (ちばん) - ground/crust (earth)/bed (gravel, river, etc.); foundation (building, etc.)/base; constituency/power base/support (electoral)/footing/foothold
地盤沈下: (じばんちんか) - (yoji) land subsidence; decline in influence
地相: (ちそう) - geographic features; divination based on the lay of the land
地祇: (ちぎ) - gods of the land; earthly deities
地神五代: (ちじんごだい) - five generations of earthly deities
地積: (ちせき) - area of a piece of land; acreage
地竜: (じりゅう) - herbal medicine prepared from dried earthworms
地紙: (じがみ) - paper for fans or parasols (cut in a fan shape); ground paper/backing paper
地縁集団: (ちえんしゅうだん) - social group with common ties to a region
地縛: (ジシバリ) - creeping lettuce (Ixeris stolonifera); southern crabgrass (Digitaria ciliaris)
地縛り: (ジシバリ) - creeping lettuce (Ixeris stolonifera); southern crabgrass (Digitaria ciliaris)
地縛霊: (じばくれい) - ghost bound to a specific physical location (usu. where death occurred)
地肌: (じはだ) - texture/grain; one's skin (lacking makeup, etc.)/natural skin/bare skin/scalp; surface of the earth/bare ground; surface of a sword blade
地胆: (にわつつ) - blister beetle; oil beetle (insects family Meloidae)
地膚: (じはだ) - texture/grain; one's skin (lacking makeup, etc.)/natural skin/bare skin/scalp; surface of the earth/bare ground; surface of a sword blade
地蔵: (じぞう) - Ksitigarbha (bodhisattva who looks over children, travellers and the underworld) (travelers); Jizo
地蔵尊: (じぞうそん) - Jizo (guardian deity of children); (image of) Khitigarbha-bodhisattva
地蔵盆: (じぞうぼん) - Jizo Festival (child-focused religious festival, in which Jizo statues are decorated, esp. in Kyoto; 23-24 August)
地蔵菩薩: (じぞうぼさつ) - Ksitigarbha (bodhisattva who looks over children, travellers and the underworld) (travelers)
地蔵顔: (じぞうがお) - gentle and round face; cheerful face; face like the Boddhisattva Jizo
地虫: (じむし) - scarabaeid beetle grub; any insect (or worm, etc.) that lives in soil
地蜘蛛: (ジグモ) - Atypus karschi (Asian species of mygalomorph spider)
地表: (ちひょう) - surface of the earth; ground surface
地袋: (じぶくろ) - cupboard on the floor
地謡前: (じうたいまえ) - stage left (on a noh stage), in front of the chorus
地謡座: (じうたいざ) - noh chorus seating area; side stage (noh)
地謡座前: (じうたいざまえ) - stage left (on a noh stage), in front of the chorus
地財法: (ちざいほう) - Local Government Finance Act
地質時代: (ちしつじだい) - geological age; prehistory
地金: (じきん) - ore/unprocessed metal/ground metal; (one's) true character
地雷: (jirai) - land mine; topic that sets someone off, sensitive topic, taboo topic, trigger , land mine; topic that sets someone off, sensitive topic, taboo topic, trigger; something that seems fine at first but turns out to be very bad (ex.: produto, negócio), booby trap, pitfall
地雷臭: (じらいしゅう) - suspicion that something is inferior (game, product, etc.)
地雷除去作業: (じらいじょきょさぎょう) - mine-clearing operation
地震モーメント: (じしんモーメント) - seismic moment
地震予知情報: (じしんよちじょうほう) - earthquake prediction information
地震前兆現象: (じしんぜんちょうげんしょう) - earthquake precursor
地震地帯: (じしんちたい) - seismic part (zone, belt)
地震帯: (じしんたい) - earthquake zone; earthquake belt
